channel.title: Hosting your server
channel.description:
Hey guys see I left Moparscape and all of Runescape private servers for some time now. Now that i am back i have finally gotten a actual PC I can host stuff on. My Java is not that good and i was wondering if anyone needed me to host there server for them, completely free, no cost... Just give me a link and your MSN and I can start hosting...
See back then (i think 3 months ago) the servers were not that stable and had an uptime of like 30 min... Are they atleast stable cause if I am hosting a server I dont wanna keep going up and down my house to restart it...
anyways.
thank you, sound/leeroy
--------------------------------- SPECS T1 internet Dual Intel Pentium 4 Xeon CPUs 2 GB DDR ECC memory 3 10,000 RPM Seagate HDDs: Dual 146 GB user volume with RAID 1 mirroring 146 GB 24-hour user volume backup 2 "Ultra SCSI 2" disk I/O channels
* its a very powerful machine i have spent a good amount of money on it*
( its designed to run freebsd on it but i can very easily change that)

item.title: Hosting your server
item.dc:creator: @leeroy21 leeroy21
item.description:
@leeroy21 wrote:

Actually servers are still as unstable as they were back then.

as i see now… lol… o well
